caption: b"Congratulations to our #HispanicHeritageMonth essay contest winners! This year, we asked middle and high school students across our footprint to describe a Hispanic person whom they consider to be a hero and why. We are thrilled to be celebrating this year's winners during a virtual event in the coming weeks."

b'At AUSA, we\xe2\x80\x99re proud to support the dedicated men and women who serve or have served our nation. In honor of Veterans Day, we\xe2\x80\x99re hosting a virtual 5K race for our employees to support the @vfwhq Unmet Needs Program and to show our appreciation for those who put their lives on the line to keep our country safe.\n\n:United_States: #veteransday #vetsday'
b'Happy Halloween from AUSA! :jack-o-lantern:'

b'In honor of Veterans Day, AUSA invited our employees to participate in a virtual 5K benefiting the @vfwhq\xe2\x80\x99s Unmet Needs Program. 
.
.
This weekend, AUSA Systems Engineer Andy Ramanand routed his 5K to include the VFW Post 4927 and Post 432 in Port Jefferson, NY. 
.
.
AUSA is proud to support our veterans, and we are excited to see so many of our employees share our support. :clapping_hands:
 
 #5k4Vets'

b'In addition to providing funds and device donations, Altice USA is continuing our support for remote learning by offering our Altice Advantage broadband solution complimentary for 60 days to households with K-12 and/or college students who do not currently have home internet access. 
.
.
Additionally, we have launched an Educator Discount to thank our educators for their inspiring dedication during these unprecedented times. 
.
.
We are proud to support our communities and the innovators and technologists of tomorrow as remote learning continues.'

b'Congratulations to AUSA\xe2\x80\x99s five leaders who were named as top multi-ethnic leaders on @cablefax_official\xe2\x80\x99s Diversity List! During a week when the whole cable industry recognizes the importance of diversity, we are so proud to celebrate our leaders. Cheers!'
b'This #HispanicHeritageMonth, we\xe2\x80\x99re spotlighting some of our Hispanic customers and their inspiring accomplishments. Take a look :backhand_index_pointing_right:'

b'AUSA is proud to join the Coalition to Back Black Businesses with @USCCFoundation @usblackchambers, @thenbl1900, @walkerslegacy, National Black Chamber of Commerce & @AmericanExpress to provide hundreds of Black-owned small businesses with grants, training and resources to help in their recovery from COVID-19. \n\nApply by 9/21 and learn more at webackblackbusinesses.com. #WeBackBlackBusinesses'

b'Altice USA, @Optimum & @mysuddenlink are excited to celebrate #HispanicHeritageMonth with our annual essay contest for middle & high school students across our service areas, in partnership with @Univision! Students can enter by writing about a Hispanic person they consider to be a hero for a chance to win a $1,500 scholarship. Submissions close 10/31. Learn more at Optimum.com/HHM or Suddenlink.com/HHM.'
b'On September 5, 2019, Altice USA entered the wireless industry with the launch of Altice Mobile. \n\nCheers to one year of Altice Mobile! :party_popper::clapping_hands::clinking_glasses:'

b'Together has no limits\xe2\x80\xa6 not even the NYC skyline. We are thrilled with the brand new Altice signage adorning all four sides of the crown of One Court Square - our LIC HQ - for all of the NY Metro area and visitors to see. :clapping_hands: A very proud moment for all of us here at AUSA.'

b'Small businesses are the backbones of the communities we\xe2\x80\x99re privileged to serve. And in their time of need, we\xe2\x80\x99re helping to support their return to prosperity and a brighter tomorrow. We are proud to be teaming up with @usccfoundation to help deliver cash grants to small businesses throughout our footprint that will aid in their recovery from the dramatic impact of COVID-19. Learn more at savesmallbusiness.com. #SaveSmallBusiness'

b"Congratulations to AUSA\xe2\x80\x99s four leaders named to @Cablefax Magazine's Top 100 Power Players list which salutes the most influential executives whose leadership continues to take the industry to new heights. Cheers! #Cablefax100"

b"In challenging times, it's awesome to see so many of our colleagues rising to the occasion and going the extra mile. At AUSA, it's our people that make the difference. 
.
.
We\xe2\x80\x99re excited to share the next installment of our #NoLimits video series.
.
.
Meet Tony Watson, who helps keep our facilities in the expansive west region running smoothly. He\xe2\x80\x99s traveled over 30,000 miles on his Harley. The definition of driven, take a ride with Tony and learn what \xe2\x80\x9cwind therapy\xe2\x80\x9d means to him."

b'As part of Altice USA\xe2\x80\x99s COVID response initiatives, the company has made charitable donations to support 29 Boys and Girls Clubs of America local affiliates in 12 states across our @optimum and @mysuddenlink footprint.\nAUSA is committed to supporting the next generation of leaders by providing a safe place to learn and grow, and to develop character and skills to embark on the path to a great future. #AlticeConnects @bgca_clubs'

b'The last few months at home have blurred the lines between \xe2\x80\x9cwork family\xe2\x80\x9d and traditional family. For Jeremiah Jones and Marcus Jones those lines don\xe2\x80\x99t exist as this father and son duo are both AUSA employees. In addition to working for the same company, Jeremiah and Marcus along with mom and sister work together to host and produce a monthly show on Roku that\xe2\x80\x99s been gaining traction online.
See how the Joneses \xe2\x80\x98kick it\xe2\x80\x99 when they\xe2\x80\x99re at home.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#nolimits #companyculture #employeeappreciation #corporateculture'
b'#blackouttuesday'

b'Today we announced our $10 million Community Relief Program aimed at supporting small and medium-sized business customers and a separate program supporting @feedingamerica and @bgca_clubs. Read more at alticeusa.com/smbrecovery.'

b'In light of the evolving COVID-19 pandemic, today we announced that we are extending our free student broadband and WiFi offerings until the end of the 2019 - 2020 school year to help students and schools stay connected to online teaching and learning.'

b':waving_hand: From all of us at Altice USA, we want to assure you that we will get through this, because we\xe2\x80\x99re all in this together. #inthistogether \nClick the link in our bio for more.'

b'We know how important it is that you stay connected. We have dedicated teams ready to support you and have prepared our network for the increased demands of your home, business and school needs. See our IG stories to learn more.'

b'The safety and well-being of Altice USA\xe2\x80\x99s customers, communities and employees is our priority. We recognize the important role we play in providing our @Optimum, @Suddenlink and Altice Business customers with connectivity solutions during this critical time. Additionally, Altice USA is proud to have joined the Keep Americans Connected Pledge announced today by the @FCC. Click the link in our bio to learn more about how Altice USA is helping keep our communities safe. #KeepAmericansConnected'

b'Big congrats to these talented AUSA employees who were celebrated as inventors on patents awarded in 2019! Innovation is at the core of Altice USA\xe2\x80\x99s DNA and these employees bring that to life every day. :trophy::gear::laptop_computer::light_bulb::nut_and_bolt:'
b'This #WomensHistoryMonth, Altice USA is proud to celebrate the progress made in the fight for gender equality with @kirstengillibrand. #InternationalWomensDay'
b'Extend your Altice One entertainment experience to additional rooms throughout your home with the new Altice One app on Apple TV. Link in bio to learn more.'
b'Bring every room to life with intelligent coverage. Optimum\xe2\x80\x99s Smart WiFi available on Altice One.'

b'Optimum and Suddenlink stores across our footprint are undergoing renovations to provide customers an excellent interaction experience with Altice\xe2\x80\x99s latest innovative products and services, including the new Altice Mobile service, the Altice One entertainment and connectivity platform, and the Altice Amplify intelligent home speaker.'
b'We know what you really want to do this Valentine\xe2\x80\x99s Day. :winking_face::two_hearts::television:'
b'@news12nj shared the story of three siblings in Red Bank, NJ. Watch to see how they caught @theellenshow\xe2\x80\x99s attention. :movie_camera: : ellentube & @news12nj'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re thrilled to announce that for the second year in a row, AUSA has achieved a perfect score of 100 on the 2020 @HumanRightsCampaign\xe2\x80\x99s Corporate Equality Index & was named one of the Best Places to Work for LGBTQ Equality! :party_popper::party_popper::party_popper:'

b'Meet Eric Zimmermann \xe2\x80\x93 part @optimum Experience Center Manager, part inventor \xe2\x80\x93 whose passion for problem-solving has led him to create five patents. We chowed down on some wings with his newest invention, \xe2\x80\x9cThe Trong,\xe2\x80\x9d and more in our first #NoLimits video of 2020. :gear_selector::gear_selector::gear_selector::gear_selector:'
